user_query: at him. At the brink of danger, He's saved thanks to an older boy in the neighborhood. "Sorry about last time." He walks home in tears. Sang-woo unwraps the toy box. Inside, he finds 2,000 won. From picking bracken to growing pumpkins, She saved even the bus fare, all for her grandson. Every hello comes with a goodbye A letter came from Mom. It was a letter saying they'd come pick up Sang-woo soon. "Okay, read this again carefully." "This one says 'I'm hurt.' And this one, 'I miss you.'" "Now, write it." Sang-woo teaches his illiterate Grandma two precious words. "You can't call me… and you can't even write. Then how will I ever hear from you?" "If you get really sick, don't write anything. Just send the paper." "Then I'll know it's from you, and I'll come running right away." "Okay? Promise?" Tomorrow is the day he leaves. While Grandma sleeps, Sang-woo prepares his final gift. "Eat well, okay?" "I'll try to come again before the New Year." "Sang-woo, anything to say to Grandma?" "He's probably just shy." Sang-woo can't even look Grandma in the eyes. He says nothing as he boards the bus. He hands over the gift he prepared the night before. As the bus pulls away, he speaks his heart in Grandma's language. From: Grandma To: Sang-woo "It hurts" From: Grandma To: Sang-woo "I miss you."

entities.entity_description: 상우는 시골 할머니 집에 머물다가 엄마에게 돌아가는 어린 소년으로, 글을 모르는 할머니에게 글자를 가르쳐주는 인물이다
할머니는 상우의 외할머니로, 글을 읽고 쓸 줄 모르지만 손자를 위해 고사리를 캐고 호박을 키우며 버스비까지 아끼는 헌신적인 인물이다
엄마는 상우의 어머니로, 상우를 데리러 오겠다는 편지를 보낸 인물이다
동네 형은 위험에 처한 상우를 구해준 나이 많은 소년이다

relationships.relationship_description: 상우는 할머니의 손자이며, 할머니에게 '아프다'와 '보고싶다'라는 글자를 가르쳐준다
할머니는 상우를 위해 돈을 모으고 헌신적으로 돌봐주는 인물이다
엄마는 상우의 어머니로 상우를 데리러 온다
동네 형은 위험에 처한 상우를 구해준다
